title: 638. Conversations with Urban Meyer on Building a Winning Culture
itunes:title: 638. Conversations with Urban Meyer on Building a Winning Culture
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode of Move the Sticks. To start off, the guys react to the news of Urban Meyer being hired as the Jacksonville Jaguars head coach and look at his fit with the team (2:04). Then, the duo revisit past interviews with Urban Meyer, as coach talks about what a championship culture entails (8:32). Next, Coach Meyer discusses what he looks for in a quarterback (15:04). After that, coach emphasizes the importance of toughness in a quarterback (20:39). Then, Coach Meyer explains how he approaches every meeting (24:19). To wrap up the show, Urban Meyer touches on overcoming adversity through a pandemic (26:50). Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
